item.title: Case study: Designing a fitness app
item.description: As a personal project I decided to design a fitness app FitTrack. This case study showcases my process in creating and designing this project.

item.title: Case study: NGO website re-design
item.description: Proud Indian are a non-profit organization who focus on low-income communities, creating small scale business models to create a self-sustaining society. I was tasked with redesigning their website by re-organizing it and give it a more modern feel.

item.title: Illustrations
item.description: A compilation of various illustrations that I have made https://www.behance.net/gallery/111510897/Illustrations

item.title: UI design: Music player app
item.description: UI design of a simple music player app. https://www.behance.net/gallery/112278535/Music-App-UI-Design
